about.title: about
description: I'm an iOS and software developer based in Germany, currently focusing on reliable, testable systems.
My experience includes QA and testing at Samsung and Applause, embedded testing at dSPACE, and ML-based development at Cargoboard.
At CHECK24, I contributed to iOS development with SwiftUI and implemented unit tests.
I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of Paderborn, with research focused on explainable AI and predictive analytics.
I'm always open to learning, enjoy working across disciplines, and value thoughtful, quality-driven development.

description: I'm an iOS and software developer based in Germany, currently focusing on reliable, testable systems.
I started my journey by independently building iOS apps, which sparked my interest in software engineering.
My experience includes QA and testing at Samsung and Applause, embedded testing at dSPACE, and ML-based development at Cargoboard.
At CHECK24, I contributed to iOS development with SwiftUI and implemented unit tests.
I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of Paderborn, with research focused on explainable AI and predictive analytics.
I'm always open to learning, enjoy working across disciplines, and value thoughtful, quality-driven development.
